com.ace.lewissketch
Class GUI

java.lang.Object
  com.ace.lewissketch.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
LsConstants
final class GUI
extends Object
implements LsConstants

Sets up the Graphical User Interface (buttons, listener, toolbars, etc) for the LewisSketch applet.

Creates tool tips that appear when the user "hovers" the mouse over a button.

addActionCommands

private void addActionCommands()
Creates string-based action commands for buttons with icons instead of names (the name suffices as the action command for those). These string action commands are used by the action listener to determine which button was pressed by the user. The applet assumes any action command of length 1 or 2 is an ATOM button, so it is important that non-atom buttons have an action command of length 3 or greater. There should also be an enumerated type value in enum lsTask (lsTask.java) for each task action.

addActionListener

private void addActionListener(ActionListener actLst)
Adds an action listener.

Parameters:
actLst - listens to the applet for an action

createToolBar

private JToolBar createToolBar()
Creates the tool bar.

setBondButton

void setBondButton(int task)
Sets the icon and task of the bond button.

Parameters:
task - which bond has been selected from the bond tool

setBondSelections

void setBondSelections()
Sets the selections of the bond and bond menu buttons.
